thread.title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to Sept 24
thread.title_full: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to Sept 24 | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to Sept 24
text:
Sept 14 (Reuters) -
For other diaries, please see:
Top economic events
Government debt auctions
Political and general news events
Index of all diaries
Guide to economic indicators
** This Diary is filed daily *** MONDAY, SEPTEMBER 14 ACCRA - Bank of Ghana interest rate decision - 1100 GMT. TUESDAY, SEPTEMBER 15 KUWAIT CITY - Central Bank of Kuwait Governor Mohammad Yousef Al-Hashel and Kuwait Finance Minister Anas Al-Saleh speak at the Euromoney Kuwait Conference. BEIRUT - Beirut hosts an Iraqi banking forum (to Sept. 16) at the Phoenicia Hotel attended by the central bank governors of Lebanon and Iraq. SANTIAGO - Central bank of Chile interest rate decision - 2100 GMT. WARSAW - National Bank of Poland holds monetary policy council meeting (interest rate announcement not expected). WEDNESDAY, SEPTEMBER 16 PARIS - Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD) updates key macroeconomic forecasts for major economies - 0900 GMT. AMSTERDAM - 4th OECD Forum on Tax and Crime (to Sept. 17). BANGKOK - Bank of Thailand holds monetary policy committee meeting - 0730 GMT. KAMPALA - Uganda to host the International Gas and Oil conference (to Sept. 17). Uganda President Yoweri Museveni and Finance Minister Matia Kasaija are the key speakers. THURSDAY, SEPTEMBER 17 ABIDJAN - Africa Islamic Finance Forum in Ivory Coast (to Sept. 18). Ivory Coast Prime Minister Daniel Kablan Duncan, Ivory Coast President Alassane Ouattara and Central Bank of West African States Governor Tiemoko Meyliet Kone will be speaking at the forum. CAIRO - Central Bank of Egypt holds monetary policy committee meeting to announce interest rates - 0200 GMT. BUCHAREST - Annual seminar organized by an association of bank analysts on "Romania's economic outlook over the next decade". Romanian central bank Governor Mugur Isarescu is expected to attend the seminar. MONDAY, SEPTEMBER 21 ABUJA - Central Bank of Nigeria holds monetary policy meeting (to Sept. 22). PRETORIA - South African Reserve Bank starts its three-day monetary policy committee meeting (to Sept. 23). MEXICO CITY - Central Bank of Mexico publishes monetary policy statement - 1800 GMT.
TUESDAY, SEPTEMBER 22 BUDAPEST - Central bank of Hungary holds rate-setting meeting. NAIROBI - Central bank of Kenya announces rate decision. ABUJA - Central bank of Nigeria announces rate decision - 1330 GMT.
WEDNESDAY, SEPTEMBER 23
PRETORIA - South African Reserve Bank announces rate decision - 1300 GMT.
THURSDAY, SEPTEMBER 24
MANILA - Central bank of Philippines holds monetary policy meeting to announce interest rates - 0800 GMT. TAIPEI - Central Bank of the Republic of China (Taiwan) announces rate decision - 0900 GMT. PRAGUE - Czech National Bank holds monetary policy meeting to announce interest rates - 1100 GMT. JERUSALEM - Bank of Israel announces rate decision - 1300 GMT.
